articles.title: Over 1 crore children 12-14 years age-group administered Covid vaccine first dose: Mansukh Mandaviya
articles.description: The vaccination for this age group started on March 16 with Biological E's intramuscular vaccine Corbevax, two doses of which are to be administered 28 days apart. As of March 1 last year, there were 4.7 crore children aged 12 and 13 years in the country.
